name: Catch Me If You Can (itch) (Almunsaah)
description:
"Catch Me If You Can" is a hidden objects game but designed in different way,

in casual hidden objects games, objects in their right place and you have to 

find them, for example usually a bird will be on  a tree and you have to find 

it in a tree in a picture.

In this game a bird can be anywhere and you have to find it.
